thread.title: BenchmarkXPRT Development Community releases MobileXPRT 2015, a benchmark for Android devices
thread.title_full: BenchmarkXPRT Development Community releases MobileXPRT 2015, a benchmark for Android devices

author: admin
title: BenchmarkXPRT Development Community releases MobileXPRT 2015, a benchmark for Android devices
text:
Submitted by admin on 8/31/2015 @ 3:00 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Principled Technologies 
DURHAM, NC--(Marketwired - August 31, 2015) - The BenchmarkXPRT Development Community, administered by Principled Technologies (PT), is pleased to announce the release of the MobileXPRT 2015 benchmark. MobileXPRT is a free benchmark tool designed to reliably evaluate the performance of Android devices by running five test workloads that measure how well the device completes everyday tasks. The benchmark then calculates a single overall performance score for the device. 
MobileXPRT 2015 is compatible with systems running Android 4.4 and above. 
To learn more about MobileXPRT and run the benchmark, please visit MobileXPRT.com . 
To learn more about and join the BenchmarkXPRT Development community, go to www.BenchmarkXPRT.com . 
About Principled Technologies, Inc. Principled Technologies, Inc. is a leading provider of technology marketing and learning & development services. 
Principled Technologies, Inc. is located in Durham, North Carolina, USA. For more information, please visit www.principledtechnologies.com .
